page.title: 19DIFFERENT TYPES OF HOUSES
page.content: The housing in our area has changed over the last fifteen years. Most of our area was fields and farmhouses but some of these have been replaced and new housing estates have been built. The area now is a mixture of old stone built cottages, modern council estates, pre-war council houses and modern private estates. The houses have many different styles, some terraced houses, some town houses and some semi-detached and detached houses. Some houses have a front garden and a yard at the back of the house. Some have no gardens at the front of the house but a garden at the back and others have gardens at the back, front and side. Most houses have central heating and many have double glazing.
